content:
The Killers' setlist was amazing, they played all their hits like "Mr. Brightside", "Somebody Told Me", and "When You Were Young". The whole crowd was singing along, it was such a great vibe! As for the atmosphere, I think the music festival had a more energetic and lively vibe, whereas I'm expecting the John Mayer concert to be more intimate and focused on his guitar playing.

But anyway, I was thinking, since I've been to a few concerts recently, I might want to explore some new music and artists. Do you have any recommendations for music blogs or websites that can help me discover new music?
